pepc-b/scramble_v.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 ! ==============================================
00002 !
00003 !                SCRAMBLE_V
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up physical system: particle positions, velocities
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine scramble_v(i1,n)
00010 
00011   use treevars
00012   use utils
00013   implicit none
00014 
00015  integer :: dum1, dum2, dum3  
00016   real :: uxt, uyt, uzt
00017   integer :: i, j, k, kk, p, i1, n, n1
00018 
00019   dum2 = -113301 - 10*me
00020   !  exclude odd one out
00021   if (mod(n,2).ne.0) then
00022      n1=n-1
00023   else
00024     n1 = n
00025   endif
00026  write(15,*) 'scrambling ',n1,' particles'
00027   !  scramble indices to remove correlation between ux,uy,uz
00028   do i=1,n1
00029      p=i+i1-1
00030      j=n1*rano(dum2)+i1
00031      k=n1*rano(dum2)+i1
00032      kk=n1*rano(dum2)+i1
00033      uxt=ux(p)
00034      uyt=uy(p)
00035      uzt=uz(p)
00036      ux(p)=ux(kk)
00037      uy(p)=uy(j)
00038      uz(p)=uz(k)
00039      ux(kk)=uxt
00040      uy(j)=uyt
00041      uz(k)=uzt
00042   end do
00043 
00044 end subroutine scramble_v
